metadata.title: CVE-2022-28667 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Compliant (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: Out-of-bounds write for some Intel(R) PROSet/Wireless WiFi software beforeversion 22.140 may allow an unauthenticated user to potentially enabledenial of service via adjacent access.

criterions.comment: linux: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
